body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Hey!" 

 [Resonance]: You can tell she's bothered by something, not you, but something... Better not to mention it. 

[1]: "Hey" 
[2]: "Do you know who I am?"
title: Start1

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "So how's exam week going for you? Were you able to finish that final Programming Languages project you were talking about?" 

[1]: "Wait, you know who I am?" 
[2]: "Exam week?"
title: Hey

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Yes? Do you not know we're in the middle of exam week?" 

[1]: "I'm sorry, but I don't know what's going on. I think I lost my memory. Do you know anything about that?" 
[2]: "Which exams do I have?" 
[3]: "Do you know me?"
title: ExamWeek

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "We're classmates, but I'm not good with names. I'm sorry." 

[1]: "I think I lost my memory. Did you hear anything weird coming from Room 101 last night?" 
[2]: "I don't remember you either." 
[3]: "You mentioned exams. What exams do I have?"
title: KnowMe

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "That's okay! Our class is quite big."

[Resonance] "She doesn't care you don't know her. She's just trying to be polite." 

[1]: "I'm pretty sure I lost my memory. Did you hear anything weird coming from Room 101 last night?" 
[2]: "Exams! You mentioned some. What exams do I have?"
title: RememberYou

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Well, we've got Multivariable Calculus, Linear Algebra, and Discrete Mathematics exams; I'm quite worried about those to be honest. Then four projects, including a Programming Languages project due tomorrow, but I think you already finished that. I'm also quite sure you're taking an elective class." 

 [1]: "You made up those words."
[2]: "I think I lost my memory. Did you hear anything weird coming from Room 101 last night?"
title: Exams

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "I wish I did, but unfortunatelly these are all words that exist..." 

[1]:"By the way, did you hear anything weird coming from my room yesterday? I'm still quite worried about this whole amnesia thing."
title: Wow

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Now that you mention, while I was finishing my Programming Languages project, I heard some strange sounds coming from the direction of your room." 

[1]: "What kind of sounds?" 
[2]: "Do you know what it was?"
title: Memory

body:
[Camellia, the Uneasy Student]: "You know crickets? It was like that, but deeper and more imposing. Didn't look human to me. I thought I was halucinating from stress at first, but now I'm not sure." 

[1]: "Crickets? What are those?" 
[2]: "I see... Do you know anything else?"
title: Sounds

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Crickets are insects that make a chirping sound. They're quite common in the countryside, but I've never heard them here. Förgätmigej is quite a crowded city, and Moya lives at the heart of it." 

[1]: "I see... Do you know anything else? Did you see me or anything?"
title: Crickets

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "I'm sorry, that's all I know. I was too focused on my project. I've also been looking for these books, but I can't find it anywhere, and I don't want to look at that old bookshelf. I can't get close to it. Allergies."

[1]: "I see... Thanks for the help. Hopefully I'll find out what's going on. And your books! I'll check those bookshelves out."
title: AnythingElse

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Hey, did you get those books?" 

[1]: "I'm sorry, I couldn't find them. I'll keep looking."
title: Start2

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Hey, did you get those books?" 

[1]: "I found them! Here you go!" [Give Books] 
[2]: "No, not yet, I'm working on it" [Lie]
title: Start3

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Oh, thank you!" She grabs the books and starts reading. "I'll be sure to return them to the bookshelf! I'll find a way. Oh and take this!" She hands you a zip tie. "It's a zip tie bracelet from my rock band! I sing and play the guitar!" 

[1]: "Thanks! Send me some of your songs later!" [Grab the zip tie]
title: GiveBooks

body:
[Camellia, The Uneasy Student]: "Thanks for the books again!" 

[1]: "You're welcome!!"
title: Start4
